Title: LDPC codes for optical channels: Is the "FEC limit" a good predictor of post-FEC BER?
Abstract: © OSA 2015.We answer the question in the title negatively. More precisely, the FEC limit is invalid for soft decision decoding and low to medium code rates. A better predictor is the generalized mutual information.
SubjectAreas: Atomic and Molecular Physics, and Optics
